resources.string: Fields password and repeat password must be the same
The repetitions and time in the workout are aims. Rest 1 â€“ 2 minutes between rounds and 30 seconds between exercises. Maintain ideal shape and observe the safety engineering.
This program is aimed at obtaining calisthenics skills and a good basis for increasing fitness opportunities.
This is a more complex program that includes advanced variations of exercises. Challenges are placed throughout the program to help you achieve fitness goals.

This program is intended for those who are already strong enough in calisthenics and want to raise their skills and body to the next level. This program contains a detailed training for the whole body, available only to the most elite athlete calisthenics.
